alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 6:57PM CDT until April 27 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Monroe County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 656 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Holly Grove, or 14 miles south of Clarendon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. This storm has a history of producing large hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Palmer... Pine City... Lawrenceville... Ragtown... Cross Roads in Monroe County... HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
